statements: UPDATE ar_overlay_information SET overlay_image_url = 'https://example.com/image1.jpg' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ar_overlay_information SET object_coordinates = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(10 20)') WHERE object_name = 'chair';
UPDATE ar_overlay_information SET object_type = 'furniture', overlay_image_url = 'https://example.com/image1.png' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE ar_overlay_information SET object_coordinates = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(2.345 5.678)'), object_name = 'Chair' WHERE object_type = 'furniture';
UPDATE AR_Overlay_Info SET overlay_name='New Overlay Name', overlay_image_url='https://example.com/image.jpg' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE Real_World_Object SET object_description='Updated Object Description', object_location=POINT(10.1234, 20.5678) WHERE object_name='Example Object';
UPDATE AR_Overlay_Info SET overlay_description = 'Updated overlay description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Real_World_Object SET object_description = 'New object description', object_location = 'POINT(10 20)' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE AR_Overlay SET overlay_name = 'New Name', overlay_data = '{"color": "red", "size": 10}', overlay_location = POINT(40.7128, -74.0060) WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Real_World_Object SET object_description = 'Updated Description', object_location = POINT(34.0522, -118.2437), object_name = 'New Object' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE AR_Overlay SET overlay_data = 'New Data' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Real_World_Object SET object_description = 'Updated Description', object_name = 'New Name' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE ar_overlay_info SET overlay_name = 'Updated Overlay 1' WHERE overlay_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE spatial_mapping SET mapping_data = '{"key": "value"}' WHERE mapping_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE ar_overlay_info SET overlay_name = 'New Overlay Name', overlay_description = 'Updated Overlay Description' WHERE overlay_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE spatial_mapping SET mapping_data = '{"key": "value"}', mapping_description = 'New Mapping Description' WHERE mapping_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE ar_overlay_info SET overlay_description = 'New description for overlay 1' WHERE overlay_id = 1;
UPDATE real_world_objects SET object_location = POINT(40.7128, -74.0060) WHERE object_id = 3;
UPDATE ar_overlay_info SET overlay_description = 'Updated description for overlay 1' WHERE overlay_id = 1;
UPDATE ar_mappings SET map_description = 'New mapping description', map_image = '0x53616D706C654944' WHERE mapping_id = 2;
